content: leaning linen cowl by mariah stanford needles and notions us 7 4 50 mm 32 inch circular needle tapestry needle scissors yarn light dk to sport weight 50 grams of a main color 50 grams of a contrast color sample uses apothefaery fabrications luxury linen dk alpaca and silk 270 yards / 100 grams main color is cat briar green contrast color is briar rose purple variegated sizes one size finished measurements a finished circumference 22 inches 55 88 cm b finished length 14 inches 35 56 cm 1 gauge swatch knitted with us 7 4 50 mm metal needle using continental style 24 stitches and 56 row = 4 inches in linen stitch pattern see chart a it is recommended to wet block your swatch and allow it to dry completely before measuring gauge abbreviations wyif - with yarn in front rs - right side ws - wrong side knit 2 decrease - knit 2 together purl 2 decrease - purl 2 together directions cast on 122 stitches with a two color german twisted cast on make a slip knot by holding both colors of yarn together this slip knot does not count as one of the 122 stitches when you finish row 1 drop the slip knot off of your needle without working it when positioning the yarn for the german twisted cast on the main color should be over the thumb and the contrast color should be over the index finger note all stitches are slipped purlwise remember to drop the slip knot off of your needle at the end of row 1 charts are available at the end of the pattern follow chart a or use written instructions below row 1 rs with main color knit 1 *knit 1 slip 1 wyif repeat from * to last stitch knit 1 turn work row 2 ws with main color purl 1 *slip 1 wyif knit 1 repeat from * to last stitch purl 1 turn work row 3 rs with contrast color knit 1 *slip 1 wyif knit 1 repeat from * to last stitch knit 1 turn work row 4 ws with contrast color purl 1 *knit 1 slip 1 wyif repeat from * to last stitch purl 1 turn work mariahknits 2 repeat row 1 - 4 for a total of 14 times or until the piece measures 4 inches from the cast on edge ending after you have completed a row 4 decreasing row follow chart b or use written instructions below row 1 rs with main color knit 1 *knit 1 slip 1 wyif repeat from * to the last three stitches knit 1 knit 2 together turn work row 2 ws with main color purl 1 knit 1 *slip 1 wyif knit 1 repeat from * to the last stitch purl 1 turn work row 3 rs with contrast color knit 1 *slip 1 wyif knit 1 repeat from * to the last two stitches knit 2 together turn work row 4
